original_text: A man might hit an animal so that it dies. That man must give back an animal that is alive. But if he kills a man, you must punish him with death.
korean_text: 짐승을 죽인 자는 그것을 물어 줄 것이요 사람을 죽인 자는 죽일지니

sentences.original_text: A man might hit an animal
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람이 동물을 때릴 수 있다

sentences.original_text: That man must give back an animal
But if he kills a man
you must punish him with death
